document_data.name: Selinus
document_data.mainbody: '''Selinus''' was a young member of the [[Riders of Nesm√©]] in [[1484 DR]].
document_data.History: Just after the start of the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Selinus discovered that his leader, [[Varen]], was a member of a ring of horse thieves who stole Riders' horses. Despite having no clear proof, he accused Varen. This caused a schism among the Riders.
document_data.Personality: Selinus was young, idealistic, and proud. He always saw the Riders as a bastion of virtue. Selinus believed himself the only person able to restore the honor of the Riders.
